name: Maya and The Wrath of Ghantakarna
name_original: Maya and The Wrath of Ghantakarna
description:
Maya and the Wrath of Ghantakarna is a 2D platformer game.

This game follows the journey of Maya. Maya is a young girl who living in a world of chaos and havoc created by the wretched demon Ghantakarna. Maya with her new gained abilities has to explore the world and defeat the demon Ghantakarna.

Ghantakarna is a demon depicted in the myths and legends of the Newari community of Kathmandu valley. Ghantakarna was a cruel demon who used to rave havoc and chaos in the valley. Find more about who Ghantakarna was in the Game.

This game is a prototype and is based up of the 2D game kit provided by unity (The Explorer).

We hope you like the game and the story of Ghantakarna.
